text: Sergey Mikhaylovich Brin (; born August 21, 1973) is an American computer scientist and internet entrepreneur. With Larry Page, he co-founded Google. Brin was the President of Google's parent company Alphabet Inc. As of June 2018, Brin is the 10th-richest person in the world, with an estimated net worth of US$52.1 billion. ==References== Category:Google Category:1973 births Category:Living people Category:American computer scientists Category:Businesspeople from California Category:Naturalized citizens of the United States Category:Google people Category:American company founders
title: Sergey Brin
